required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: NP-G2-044 as Monotherapy and Combination Therapy in Patients With Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumor Malignancies
clinical_study.official_title: NP-G2-044 as Monotherapy and Combination Therapy in Patients With Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumor Malignancies

brief_summary.textblock: Multicenter, open-label study in patients with advanced or metastatic solid tumor malignancies to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and preliminary anti-tumor efficacy, PK, and pharmacodynamics of continuously dosed NP-G2-044 monotherapy and NP-G2-044 in combination with anti-PD-(L)1 therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Identification of the NP-G2-044 Monotherapy Recommended Phase 2 Dose (RP2D)
Number of incidences of Treatment Emergent Adverse Events with NP-G2-044 monotherapy
primary_outcome.time_frame: Time of first dose of any study drug(s) until 30 days after the last dose of study drug(s)

primary_outcome.measure: NP-G2-044 anti-tumor preliminary efficacy signals when administered as continuously dosed monotherapy assessed by RECIST 1.1
Identification of the RP2D for patients receiving NP-G2-044 in combination with anti-PD-(L)1 therapy
Number of incidences of Treatment Emergent Adverse Events with NP-G2-044 and anti-PD-(L)1 combination therapy
primary_outcome.time_frame: Time of first dose of any study drug(s) until 30 days after the last dose of study drug(s)

primary_outcome.measure: NP-G2-044 anti-tumor preliminary efficacy signals when administered in combination with anti-PD-(L)1 therapy assessed by RECIST 1.1

secondary_outcome.measure: Identify and characterize preliminary anti-tumor activity of NP-G2-044 in combination with anti-PD-(L)1 therapy

secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of NP-G2-044 and anti-PD-(L)1 Combination therapy: AUC
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of NP-G2-044 and anti-PD-(L)1 Combination therapy: Tmax
Pharmacokinetics (PK) of NP-G2-044 and anti-PD-(L)1 Combination therapy: Cmax

clinical_study.condition: Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumor Malignancies

arm_group.description: NP-G2-044 capsule PO QD for each 28-day cycle

arm_group.arm_group_label: NP-G2-044 Combination Therapy With Anti-PD-(L)1 Therapy
arm_group.description: NP-G2-044 capsule PO QD for each 28-day cycle, Anti-PD-(L)1 Therapy per standard of care, at a dose and frequency in accordance with the package insert

intervention.description: previously initiated per standard of care, at a dose and frequency in accordance with the package insert
intervention.arm_group_label: NP-G2-044 Combination Therapy With Anti-PD-(L)1 Therapy

intervention.description: 1200 mg QD or 1600 mg QD - starting dose
intervention.arm_group_label: NP-G2-044 Combination Therapy With Anti-PD-(L)1 Therapy

clinical_study.keyword: Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumor Malignancies
